description: This film documents Tim's aggressive behaviour, how it makes the family miserable and hinders Tim at school. Once the need for help has been established, the family contact the Oregan Research Institute Family Centre and move through the treatment process. The widespread changes occurring within the family as treatment progresses is shown.
